item.description:
A member of our group, Matt Albert asked me to post this ride that he would like to lead.

Be sure to bring a bike in good working condition, plenty of water, a helmet is suggested, and plenty of energy food.

Matt wrote:

I'd be interested in leading a ride from Ayer MA. There's a commuter rail station there and it's convenient to Rt. 2. I'd be interested in hosting it at 1pm this Sunday 7/27. It's a 30 mile ride. We'll do an avg pace of 12 mph and my wife will be the sweep so no one is left behind.

http://www.mapmyride....


Note: We are open to other members running events however we want you to know that we do no know of Matt's experience in leading rides. However, he did pick out a nice ride map program above that I like! I may attend this event.... :-)

Rob Fox
Organizer
item.name: Group Member Wants To Lead A Ride in Ayer Mass
